mapper.insert: insert ignore into CollectInfo(CollectID, Type, Name, GermplasmName, GermplasmNameEn , SectionName, GenericName, ScientificName, ResourceType, CollectMethod, GermplasmSource , SourceCountry, SourceProvince, Source, SourceOrg, OriginCountry, OriginPlace , CollectPlaceLongitude, CollectPlaceLatitude, CollectPlaceAltitude, CollectPlaceSoilType , CollectPlaceEcologyType, CollectMaterialType, CollectPeople, CollectUnit , CollectTime, SpeciesName, Image, CollectRemark) VALUES ( #{CollectID}, #{Type}, #{Name}, #{GermplasmName}, #{GermplasmNameEn}, #{SectionName}, #{GenericName}, #{ScientificName}, #{ResourceType}, #{CollectMethod}, #{GermplasmSource}, #{SourceCountry}, #{SourceProvince}, #{Source}, #{SourceOrg}, #{OriginCountry}, #{OriginPlace}, #{CollectPlaceLongitude}, #{CollectPlaceLatitude}, #{CollectPlaceAltitude}, #{CollectPlaceSoilType}, #{CollectPlaceEcologyType}, #{CollectMaterialType}, #{CollectPeople}, #{CollectUnit}, #{CollectTime}, #{SpeciesName}, #{Image}, #{CollectRemark} )
mapper.update: update CollectInfo set GermplasmName = #{collectInfo.GermplasmName}, GermplasmNameEn = #{collectInfo.GermplasmNameEn}, SectionName = #{collectInfo.SectionName}, GenericName = #{collectInfo.GenericName}, ScientificName = #{collectInfo.ScientificName}, ResourceType = #{collectInfo.ResourceType}, GermplasmSource = #{collectInfo.GermplasmSource}, SourceCountry = #{collectInfo.SourceCountry}, SourceProvince = #{collectInfo.SourceProvince}, Source = #{collectInfo.Source}, SourceOrg = #{collectInfo.SourceOrg}, OriginCountry = #{collectInfo.OriginCountry}, OriginPlace = #{collectInfo.OriginPlace}, CollectPlaceLongitude = #{collectInfo.CollectPlaceLongitude}, CollectPlaceLatitude = #{collectInfo.CollectPlaceLatitude}, CollectPlaceAltitude = #{collectInfo.CollectPlaceAltitude}, CollectPlaceSoilType = #{collectInfo.CollectPlaceSoilType}, CollectPlaceEcologyType = #{collectInfo.CollectPlaceEcologyType}, CollectMaterialType = #{collectInfo.CollectMaterialType}, CollectPeople = #{collectInfo.CollectPeople}, CollectUnit = #{collectInfo.CollectUnit}, CollectTime = #{collectInfo.CollectTime}, SpeciesName = #{collectInfo.SpeciesName}, Image = #{collectInfo.Image}, CollectRemark = #{collectInfo.CollectRemark} where CollectID = #{collectInfo.CollectID}
mapper.select: select a.*, b.IsLoaded, b.IsContradict, b.Status, b.IsCertified FROM CollectInfo as a, FruitInfo as b where a.CollectID = b.ID ORDER BY field(Status,3,2,1,0) , field(IsLoaded, 1, 0), field(IsContradict, 0, 1) limit #{pageNum}, #{pageIdx}
select * from CollectInfo where CollectID in (select ID from FruitInfo where IsLoaded = 1) limit #{pageNum} , #{pageIdx}
